start.text: Welcome to the decadent rich people party! Isn't this a fancy manor?

sillything.text: It sure is a fancy manor! What are you having for dinner?

murderscene.text: Terrific! You're sitting at a long banquet table dotted with candelabras, sterling silver cutlery in hand, ready to tuck in, when suddenly, a high-pitched scream comes from the ballroom.

ballroom-1.text: You rush into the ballroom and push past the gathered crowd and see the body of BUTLER DAVE, everybody's favorite butler, blood-soaked on the floor. You look around at the panicked faces of the party guests, but you are cool as...

responses.text: …Cool Hand Luke locked in the freezer with a long-dead penguin.

ballroom-2.text: Lucky a capable detective like you is on the scene! What do you do next?

witnesshub.text:
"ALRIGHT YOU LOT, WHICHEVER OF YOU WERE IN THE BALLROOM WHEN THIS SORRY EVENT OCCURED, STEP FORWARD!" 

Out of the crowd comes DR. WINSTON WHITTINGTON-FACE, beloved celebrity chiropractor, DAME LUCYNTHIA FUNT, heiress to the famed FUNT SYRUPS fortune, and DALE, THE URCHIN BOY step forward. Who do you approach first?

witness-1-0.text: You approach famous chiropractor DR. WINSTON WHITTINGTON-FACE, slightly starstruck by his celebrity status but determined to keep your wits about you.

witness-1-1.text:
"DR. WHITTINGTON FACE, can you tell me anything about who did this?"

"Yes of course!" he exclaims "It was one of my many rich and famous clients, the actress COURTNEY COX! She was wearing a catsuit, but I would recognize that spine from a mile away!" What do you do next?

witness-1-2.text:
Unable to contain yourself any longer, the words burst out of your mouth before you're even aware of them.

"Dr. Whittington-Face, please give me some wisdom about backs!" Dr. Whittington-Face has a faraway gaze and a knowing smile. 

"Well, my child," he says, "A back is never as straight as the first time." 

You take a moment to soak in his words, awed by his insight, but quickly force yourself to regain composure and continue detecting.

witness-2-0.text:
You approach DAME LUCYNTHIA FUNT, heiress to the famed FUNT SYRUPS FORTUNE. 

"Excuse me madame, can you tell me…" 

"Hello! Could I interested you in any of Papa's syrups?" she interrupts.

witness-2-1.text: "Are you sure? I have many syrups you could try. A simple syrup, perhaps?

witness-2-6.text: "Just have a little taste of this one." She holds a jar with a viscous purple liquid under your nose.

witness-2-7.text: A mixture of sweet and tart which you immediately recognize as lingonberry overwhelms your tastebuds. "Yes, it's lovely," you lie.

witness-2-8.text:
"Please can I just ask you about the murder?" you ask, exasperated.

 "Oh that? Of course that was the actress Courtney Cox. I could smell father's special blend sugar-free hazelnut as soon as she entered the room. Everyone knows FUNT'S SUGAR-FREE HAZELNUT SYRUP is the preferred syrup of the cast of the 'SCREAM' franchise of films!"

witness-3-0.text:
You approach DALE, THE URCHIN BOY, dressed in rags and a flatcap, standng defensively in front of a small tank.

 "DON'T YOU TOUCH ME URCHINS! THEY DINT SEE NUFFINK!" he shouts defensively. You peer over him and see that his tank is full of live sea urchins.

witness-3-1.text:
"No worries boy, your urchins are not suspects here, they have no opposable thumbs! Did you see the murder?" you ask. 

"Boy howdy, did I!" exclaims Dale, the Urchin Boy. "Never in my life could I forget the face of the actress COURTNEY COX, love interest in the first ACE VENTURA FILM!" His face falls. "That was me old dad's favourite film, before he fell into that ravine. I'm an orphan now, o'course, and my urchins, well...they prefer Jim Carrey's more dramatic work." 

The boy bursts into tears and climbs into the urchin tank.

witness-3-3.text:
You feel a sharp pang of recognition in your heart, having lost your own father to a reservoir. 

"Say boy, how'd you like for me to be your parent? I've got Jim Carrey's whole oeuvre on VHS and Bluray!" 

Dale the urchin boy climbs out of the tank and wipes his eyes. "Are...are you sure mister/ma'am?"

responses.text: Of course! You have so much to offer a young mind.
No way! You're not ready to be a parent.

witness-3-4.text:
"PSYCH! Have a nice life with your anenomes, NERD!" you scream into the orphan boy's face. 

Dale hangs his head, climbs into his urchin tank and sadly strokes his spiney urchins, blood streaming from his palms.

leave.text: You throw your hands in the air, having given up on your investigation with no credible clues. You start walking back to your sedan when suddenly you see a shadowy figure creeping through the hedges of the manor's vast garden...

encounter.text: You peek through the bushes and spot none other than...TV'S COURTNEY COX, covered in blood, spraying herself down with a garden hose!

responses.text: Ask if she did the murder
Ask about the sitcom she was in

sitcom.text:
"Courtney Cox, tell me about the many years you spent on sitcom standard-bearer, COUGAR TOWN!" you exclaim gleefully. 

"Well, pall, I'll tell you," she says, "Cougar Town is nothing but a collective fever dream of the American public. Also, it's the most fun I've ever had on set! Now get out of here, I have bulter blood to hose off!"

responses.text: Ask if she did the murder

talktomurderer.text:
"Courtney Cox, did you do the murder?" you ask with a tone of wry skepticism. 

"Of course not, dummy!" she exclaims defensively. "Why would I kill Dave, everybody's favorite butler? It's definitely not because I've been going to butler school since my last movie wrapped and have been trying and failing to win the hearts of the world's bulter-users."

end-1.text: You let the crowd run into the ballroom, leaving you alone to chow down. You finish your food and let out a long, satisfied burp. You leave the manor and walk home, reflecting on the epicurean pleasure of your meal and leaving the dark realities of the world to others today.

end-2.text: You leave the manor, feeling slightly disappointed not to have solved the murder of Dave, everybody's favorite butler. If a detective as sharp as you couldn't crack the case, the world will never know the real answer!

end-3.text: You walk hand-in-hand into the sunset with your new son, urchin tank in tow, away from the fancy manor forever. The world may never know who killed Dave, everybody's favorite butler, but family is forever.
